panels.description: Active incidents in the selected time range
panels.title: Active Incidents

panels.description: Number of incidents resolved in the selected time range.
panels.title: Resolved Incidents

panels.description: Number of incident (active and resolved) detected in the selected period of time.

targets.expr: count( min by (app) (min_over_time(dora:failure_creation_time[$__range])) )

panels.title: Incidents Occurred

panels.description: Deployments running in the cluster for which it has not been possible to retrieve the commit time metadata from Github. Usually, it is due to mismatching image/github repostiroy names, commit hash not used as image tag or disruption with Github API service.
panels.title: Untracked Deployments

panels.description: Deployments now running in the cluster
panels.title: Current running deployments

targets.expr: count( count by (image) (count_over_time(dora:deploytime{app!~".*gitopsdepl.*"}[$__range])))

count( min by (app) (min_over_time(dora:failure_creation_time[$__range])) )
/ 
( 
count( count by (image) (count_over_time(dora:deploytime{app!~".*gitopsdepl.*"}[$__range])))
+ 
(count(min by (image) (min_over_time(dora:deployinactive[$__range]))) OR on() vector(0))
)
avg(min by (app) (min_over_time(dora:failure_resolution_time[$__range])) - min by (app) (min_over_time(dora:failure_creation_time[$__range])))

options.content:
**DEPLOYMENT FREQUENCY**

Tracks the number of successfull deployments over time. Here is displayed as the total count in the selected time range.

Data here is obtained from the Openshift cluster deployments metadata. 

**LEAD TIME FOR CHANGE**

Measures the time it takes for a code commit to successfully make it to production.
Here is shown the average value of all successfull deployments in the selected time range.

Data here is obtained from the cluster deployments and Github's commit timestamps.

**Change Failure Rate**

Determines the changes that lead to failures after they reach production.
It is calculated by dividing the number of failed deployments in production by the total number of product deployments.

Data here is obtained from PagerDuty.

**MEAN TIME TO RESTORE**

Describes the average time to recover from a failed deployment or an incident.
It is calculated by obtaining the difference in time between an incident creation time and it resolution time.

Data here is obtained from PagerDuty.

targets.expr: count(count_over_time(dora:deploytime{app!~".*gitopsdepl.*"}[$__range]))

count( min by (app) (min_over_time(dora:failure_creation_time[$__range])) )
/ 
( 
count( count by (image) (count_over_time(dora:deploytime{app!~".*gitopsdepl.*"}[$__range])))
+ 
(count(min by (image) (min_over_time(dora:deployinactive[$__range]))) OR on() vector(0))
)
avg(min by (app) (min_over_time(dora:failure_resolution_time[$__range])) - min by (app) (min_over_time(dora:failure_creation_time[$__range])))

panels.description: Show the recents deployments detected in the last 7 days, regardless of the time range selected.

targets.expr: min(min_over_time(dora:deploytime{app!~".*gitopsdepl.*"}[$__range])) by (app, image, commit_hash) * 1000

panels.title: Recent Go-Lives

panels.description: The full list of deployment for which it was not possible to get the related commit metadata

defaults.noValue: No untracked deployments in the selected time range

targets.expr: min(min_over_time(dora:deploytime{app!~".*gitopsdepl.*"}[$__range])) by (app, image, commit_hash) * 1000 unless min(min_over_time(dora:committime[$__range])) by (app, image, commit_hash) * 1000

panels.title: Untracked deployments

panels.description: Lead Time for Change shown per image. This is the data used to calculate the global average shown above.

defaults.noValue: No new deployments in the selected time range

targets.expr: (( min by (app, image, commit_hash)( min_over_time(dora:deploytime{app!~".*gitopsdepl.*"}[$__range]) - on (app, image) group_left (commit_hash) (min by (app, image, commit_hash) (min_over_time(dora:committime{app!~".*gitopsdepl.*"}[$__range]))))))

panels.title: Lead Time for Change per image

panels.description: Deployments currently active in the cluster, regardless of the time range selected.

targets.expr: min by (app, image, commit_hash) (min_over_time(dora:deployactive{app!~".*gitopsdepl.*"}[15m]))

panels.title: Current running deplotyments

panels.description: Deployment time gathered for every image detected in the selected time range.

defaults.noValue: No new deployments in the selected time range

targets.expr: min(min_over_time(dora:deploytime{app!~".*gitopsdepl.*"}[$__range])) by (app, image, commit_hash) * 1000

panels.title: Deployment Time per image

panels.description: Commit time gathered from Github for any image detected in the cluster in the selected time range

defaults.noValue: No new commits in the selected time range

targets.expr: min(min_over_time(dora:committime[$__range])) by (app, image, commit_hash) *1000 and min(min_over_time(dora:deploytime[$__range])) by (app, image, commit_hash) *1000

panels.title: Commit Time per image

defaults.noValue: No Lead Time available for this app in the selected time range

targets.expr: count(count_over_time(dora:deploytime{app='$app'}[$__range]))

defaults.noValue: No Deployment frequency available for this app in the selected time range

targets.expr: count(count_over_time(dora:deploytime{app='$app'}[$__range]))

defaults.noValue: No Lead Time available for this app in the selected time range

targets.expr: (( min by (app, image, commit_hash)( min_over_time(dora:deploytime{app='$app'}[$__range]) - on (app, image) group_left (commit_hash) (min by (app, image, commit_hash) (min_over_time(dora:committime{app='$app'}[$__range]))))))

panels.title: Lead Time for Change per image

defaults.noValue: No commit time available for this app in the selected time range

targets.expr: min(min_over_time(dora:committime{app='$app'}[$__range])) by (app, image, commit_hash) * 1000 and min(min_over_time(dora:deploytime{app='$app'}[$__range])) by (app, image, commit_hash) * 1000

defaults.noValue: No deployment available for this app in the selected time range

targets.expr: min(min_over_time(dora:deploytime{app='$app'}[$__range])) by (app, image, commit_hash) * 1000
